title: Stars and Planets
description: This course covers stellar atmospheres, interiors and evolution, as well as the formation and physical properties of planetary systems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
